hero.title: Your Trust is
hero.description: When you entrust us with your family's most important documents, we take that responsibility seriously. Every security measure we implement is designed to protect your legacy and earn your confidence.

features.title: Security at Every Level
features.description: We've implemented comprehensive security measures across infrastructure, data, and access control to ensure your documents remain safe, private, and under your control.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: Your data is encrypted from the moment it leaves your device until you view it again. No one, not even Shamba Sure, can access your unencrypted documents.

infrastructure.title: Secure Cloud Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: We partner with leading cloud providers who meet the highest global standards for security and reliability, ensuring your data is stored in a world-class environment.

access_control.title: You Control Your Data
access_control.description: You have complete control over who can view your documents and family information. Your privacy settings are paramount.

data_privacy.title: Kenyan Data Law Compliant
data_privacy.description: We are fully compliant with the Kenya Data Protection Act (DPA). Your data is handled with the utmost respect for your rights and local regulations.

audits.title: Regular Security Audits
audits.description: We engage independent security experts to regularly audit our systems and test our defenses, ensuring we stay ahead of potential threats.

support.title: Secure Customer Support
support.description: Our support team is trained in security best practices. We will never ask for your password and have strict protocols to protect your account.

compliance.title: Compliance You Can Trust
compliance.description: We adhere to the highest industry standards and Kenyan regulations to ensure your data is handled with the utmost care and legal compliance.

kdpa.title: Kenya Data Protection Act (KDPA)
kdpa.description: Fully compliant with the KDPA, ensuring your data rights and privacy are always protected.

iso.title: ISO 27001 Standards
iso.description: Aligned with international standards for information security management and control.

legal.title: Legal Data Stewardship
legal.description: Our policies are built on transparency, accountability, and Kenyan data governance laws.

backup.title: Redundant Cloud Backups
backup.description: We maintain secure, encrypted backups in multiple regions to ensure your data remains safe even in disaster scenarios.

no_selling.title: We Never Sell Your Data
no_selling.description: Your personal information and documents will never be sold, shared, or used for advertising. Ever.

full_control.title: You Stay in Control
full_control.description: You decide who can view or edit your data — and you can revoke access at any time.

transparent.title: Transparent Practices
transparent.description: We clearly explain our data policies, so you always know how your information is used and protected.

kenyan_law.title: Protected Under Kenyan Law
kenyan_law.description: Your information is governed by Kenya’s data protection laws, giving you strong legal safeguards and recourse.

faq.title: Your Questions, Answered
faq.description: Transparency builds trust. Here are detailed answers to the most common security and privacy questions.
faq.a1: Only you and the individuals you explicitly grant access to (such as designated heirs or trusted contacts) can see your documents. Our internal team cannot view the content of your encrypted files.
faq.a2: Your data is stored in highly secure, geographically distributed data centers managed by our top-tier cloud infrastructure partners. This ensures high availability and disaster recovery.
faq.q3: Is this platform legally compliant in Kenya?
faq.a3: Yes. We have designed Shamba Sure to be fully compliant with the Kenya Data Protection Act (DPA) and other relevant regulations. We are committed to upholding the legal standards for data privacy and security.
faq.q4: What happens to my data if I close my account?
faq.a4: If you choose to close your account, you will have the option to securely download all of your data. Following a grace period, your data will be permanently and irretrievably deleted from our systems in accordance with data protection best practices.
faq.q5: How often are your systems tested?
faq.a5: We perform continuous monitoring and quarterly penetration tests to identify and address vulnerabilities before they can be exploited.
faq.q6: How do you handle data breaches?
faq.a6: In the unlikely event of a data breach, our incident response protocol ensures immediate containment, transparent communication, and compliance with KDPA breach reporting obligations.

more_questions.title: Still Have Questions?
more_questions.description: Our security team is here to help. Contact us directly for detailed answers about our security practices.
